# Various Pitch Types

_ Create a separate pitch for each audience/focus_

- Publisher Pitch
- Marketable
- Short & Punchy/Actual Elevator 
- Character/Mascot Driven
- Gameplay (Steam/Trailer/etc)
- All Ages Pitch
- "High Concept" Style (Hollywood Pitch) (this should be the one in the Concept Doc)
- Investor  (merge with Publisher?)
- Back of Box Pitch (maybe merge with a couple of above)
